00033                 t_symbol*       oname;

00064         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00065         {       
00066                 t_class *c;
00067                 
00068                 c = class_new("OMax.id2state", (method)OMax_id2state_new, (method)OMax_id2state_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_id2state), 
00069                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00070                 
00071                 // assistance
00072                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_id2state_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00073                 
00074                 // input methods
00075                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_id2state_do, "int", 0);
00076                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_id2state_setname, "set", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00077                 
00078                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00079                 OMax_id2state_class = c;
00080                 
00081                 return 0;
00082         }

00089         void *OMax_id2state_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00090         {
00091                 t_OMax_id2state *x = NULL;
00092                 
00093                 // object instantiation, NEW STYLE
00094                 if ((x = (t_OMax_id2state *)object_alloc(OMax_id2state_class)))
00095                 {
00096                         // outlet init
00097                         x->out = intout(x);
00098                         
00100                         x->obound = FALSE;
00101                         if (argc > 0)
00102                         {
00103                                 if (argv->a_type != A_SYM)
00104                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of an existing Oracle)");
00105                                 else
00106                                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00107                         }
00108             else
00109                 x->oname = NULL;
00110                         
00111                         // color
00112                         t_object *box;
00113                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00114                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00115                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00116                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00117                 }
00118                 return (x);
00119         }

00131         void OMax_id2state_assist(t_OMax_id2state *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00132         {
00133                 if (m == ASSIST_INLET) { // inlet
00134                         sprintf(s, "id, set [symbol] changes sequence to read");
00135                 } 
00136                 else {  // outlet
00137                         sprintf(s, "state number");                     
00138                 }
00139         }

00145         
00148         bool OMax_id2state_bind(t_OMax_id2state *x)
00149         {
00151                 if (x->obound == FALSE)
00152                 {
00154                         if ((x->oname) && (x->oname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->oname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.oracle")))
00155                         {
00156                                 x->oracle = &(((t_OMax_oracle*)(x->oname->s_thing))->oracle);
00157                                 // If binding is ok, then don't do it next time.
00158                                 x->obound = TRUE;
00159                         }
00160                         else
00161                         {
00162                 if (x->oname)
00163                     object_error((t_object *)x,"No Oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00164                 else
00165                     object_error((t_object *)x,"No Oracle name given");
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168                 return x->obound;
00169         }
00170         
00172         
00174 
00175         
00179         void OMax_id2state_do(t_OMax_id2state *x, long id)
00180         {
00181                 if (OMax_id2state_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00182                 {
00183                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00184                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00185                         {
00186                                 if (x->oracle->get_size()>0 && id>=0)
00187                                 {
00188                     outlet_int(x->out, x->oracle->get_state(id)); // output
00189                                 }
00190                         }
00191                         else
00192                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s busy",x->oname->s_name);
00193                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00194                 }
00195         }
00196         
00200         void OMax_id2state_setname(t_OMax_id2state *x, t_symbol *s)
00201         {
00202                 x->oname = s;
00203                 x->obound = FALSE;
00204                 OMax_id2state_bind(x);
00205         }

00208 }
